overview: Maximize calories burned and multiply your results while improving your cardiovascular fitness. Gaiam's Cardio Pilates DVD is an invigorating fusion of classic Pilates movements and fat-burning cardio exercises. This Pilates DVD delivers a satisfying workout with the strengthening, body-shaping effects that have made Pilates one of today's most popular fitness techniques. With certified Pilates instructor Ana Caban.
tagline: An invigorating fusion of classic Pilates movements and fat-burning cardio exercise, Cardio Pilates delivers the strength conditioning effects Pilates is known for, as well as a results-intensifying, heart-rate boosting cardiovascular workout.
title: Cardio Pilates
